details.title: Reservify
details.description: A hotel reservation app displays all the existing hotels and details of each hotel, allowing the user to reserve the hotel they want.

details.title: Recipe App
details.description: Web application that allows you to save recipes and shows the shopping list to create them!

details.title: Budgets!
details.description: Web application that allows you to record money transactions and separate them in categories

details.title: Blog App!
details.description: Blog Web Application that allows you to create posts and comments! First time using Rails, it has API endpoints to get, create posts and comments.

details.title: Space Traveler's Hub
details.description: A Web application that showcases Rockets and Missions from the SpaceX API, you can reserve Rockets and join Missions to your profile.

details.title: Math Magicians React
details.description: Web application that allows you to calculate mathematics expressions

details.title: Bookstore - React
details.description: Web Application that allows you to add and remove books! This project was created with the purpose of consolidating the creator's knowledge of React.

details.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Card Database
details.description: Web application that showcases Yu-Gi-Oh! card. You can like and comment cards.

details.title: EXPO SOFTWARE 2021 ~ 2022
details.description: My first capstone project at Microverse's program! It is about an international Software Expo!
